snippet: Ramires and Didier Drogba scored goals Saturday as Chelsea beat Liverpool, 2-1, at Wembley Stadium to win the English F.A. Cup.
abstract: New York Red Bulls defeat Los Angeles Galaxy, 1-0, in the teams' only regular-season meeting; other soccer results noted.
lead_paragraph: Ramires and Didier Drogba scored goals Saturday as Chelsea beat Liverpool, 2-1, at Wembley Stadium to win the English F.A. Cup.

headline.seo: Chelsea Wins Its Fourth English F.A. Cup in Six Years
headline.main: For Chelsea, Right Man in the Right Place
headline.print_headline: Lindpere’s Goal Gives Red Bulls a Victory
